name: captain solus
description:
An action adventure game about escaping a mysterious spaceship.

Captain Solus and his crew are exploring an abandoned ship in the middle of space. As the Captain is exploring and searching through items left on the ship, he is shot in the back by his crewmates and betrayed.

Carefully step through the unknown parts of the ship, fighting any strange creatures that appear to find your way out of this eerie ship.

Will you be able to escape?

Features

  • 👷‍♂️ 8 different colours of Captain Solus to play as
  • 🔫 2 guns you can use
  • 👽 4 bosses to fight
  • 🕒 Around 5 minutes of playtime

Controls:

  • Press W for walking forward
  • Use the mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot
  • Space to roll

I hope you enjoy playing!

~newtinn
